overview: Andrew initially qualified as a surgeon from Cambridge University. He practiced for six years, specialising in neurosurgery, before joining the Boston Consulting Group (BCG) as a consultant in 2001. Whilst at BCG he specialised in healthcare strategy, gaining experience with many large, global clients across the full spectrum of healthcare including biotechnology, pharmaceuticals, service and care providers, software and telecommunications. He joined Close Ventures in 2005. Andrew became a partner in Albion Ventures in 2009.
